projects.title: Secure Banking Platform
projects.description: A highly secure, responsive banking application built with React, TypeScript, and advanced authentication protocols. Features biometric login and real-time fraud detection.

projects.title: Health Monitoring Mobile App
projects.description: An iOS and Android application helping users monitor their health metrics including heart rate, sleep patterns, and physical activity. Integrates with various wearable devices.

projects.title: AI-Powered Inventory Management
projects.description: A sophisticated inventory management system leveraging machine learning to predict stock needs, reduce waste, and optimize supply chain operations.

projects.title: Immersive Virtual Reality Training
projects.description: A VR-based training platform for industrial workers, providing realistic simulations of hazardous environments and emergency scenarios to improve safety protocols.

projects.title: Secure Messaging Platform
projects.description: An end-to-end encrypted messaging application designed for businesses requiring high-security communications. Features ephemeral messaging and remote deletion capabilities.

projects.title: Smart Home Automation System
projects.description: A comprehensive IoT solution for residential homes, enabling automation of lighting, climate control, security systems, and energy management through a unified dashboard.
